amendatorysection.catchline: Consumer reporting agency; mandatory removal of security freeze; conditions.
amendatorysection.para: A consumer reporting agency shall remove a security freeze placed under section 8-2603 within three business days after receiving a request for removal from the consumer who provides both of the following:
(1) Sufficient proof of identity of the consumer; and
(2) The unique personal identification number or password referred to in subdivision (2)(b) of section 8-2606.
